<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
LOGISTICS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/13/biden-launches-effort-to-alleviate-clogged-supply-chains?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
In the Supply Chain Story, the Port Thickens
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/13/biden-launches-effort-to-alleviate-clogged-supply-chains?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Aerial view of the Long Beach and Los Angeles ports" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bl383u0v/production/2cd86c1aed2287150a5ad118fc8a15a6e156d9a2-1024x689.jpg?w=670&q=70&auto=format">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Mario Tama/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Some US corporations are about to work Waffle House hours.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In the face of historic supply chain bottlenecks, large goods carriers Walmart, UPS, and FedEx pledged yesterday to <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/white-house/white-house-announce-walmart-fedex-ups-will-increase-services-help-n1281387?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">ramp up</a> their efforts to relieve some of the clogging from ports. Meanwhile, the Port of Los Angeles, one of the busiest in the country, will join its neighbor the Port of Long Beach and go 24/7.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Together, LA and Long Beach move more than 25% of American imports, the </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/l-a-port-to-operate-around-the-clock-to-ease-cargo-logjams-white-house-says-11634115601?mod=hp_lead_pos7" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">WSJ reports</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>But loads of containers are stuck there, and </span><span><a href="https://apnews.com/article/coronavirus-pandemic-joe-biden-business-los-angeles-health-48ff262b882a37308e4a3f15934b2ee4?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">81 cargo ships</a></span><span> are hanging out in the Pacific Ocean waiting to dock and unload as of Monday.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">A problem so bad POTUS needed to get involved</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This overtime plan was put together by the Biden administration, which has been scrambling to solve one of the nastiest side effects of the pandemic. As a result of factory shutdowns, worker shortages, and high demand, supply chains have become more tangled than your headphone wires.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px"><li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span><strong style="color:#000">How you know it’s ugly: </strong></span><span>This year, S&P 500 companies have said the words “</span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-10-13/supply-chain-chatter-hits-record-highs-on-earnings-calls?srnd=premium" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">supply chain</a></span><span>” on earnings calls more than “synergy” or “value proposition” combined.</span>
</li></ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Another reason the White House is so concerned about this issue?</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Inflategate won’t go away</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The prices of goods and services, as measured by the consumer price index, rose <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-10-13/u-s-consumer-prices-grew-by-more-than-forecast-in-september?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">5.4% annually</a> in September. That’s the same pace as in June and July but a little higher than August.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Snarled supply chains are considered one of the main drivers of higher prices this year. And skyrocketing prices, especially in the energy sector, could put a dent in the economic recovery. Just a few days ago, Goldman Sachs <a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/us/goldman-cuts-forecast-us-economic-growth-2021-2022-2021-10-10/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">cut its economic growth</a> forecasts for 2021 and 2022.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>In yet another sign of rising inflation, retirees receiving Social Security benefits will get a <a href="https://apnews.com/article/social-security-cola-increase-4f2cd7b763371b91923227be883e367e?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">5.9% bump</a> in their payments in 2022 to adjust for the higher cost of living. That’s the biggest increase to Social Security checks in 39 years.—<em>NF</em></p>
</div>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
LABOR
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/13/film-and-tv-workers-john-deere-employees-and-healthcare-workers-join-the-strike-wave?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Strike Szn
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/13/film-and-tv-workers-john-deere-employees-and-healthcare-workers-join-the-strike-wave?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt='Picket signs that read "Fed up" "Pay us more" "Higher wages now"  and crossed out "forced overtime"' style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bl383u0v/production/17126f43743b47705965e4f06d6a80859de9c867-1500x1000.jpg?w=670&q=70&auto=format">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em><em>Francis Scialabba</em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Remember how yesterday we said that everyone (4.3 million Americans in August) was <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/12/americans-quit-their-jobs-at-a-record-rate-in-august?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">quitting their job</a>? Well, the American worker’s dissatisfaction doesn’t stop there. Strikes—actual and threatened—are popping up from coast to coast.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The International Alliance of Theatrical Stage Employees (IATSE) said yesterday that if an agreement isn’t reached with major studios and streaming services, 60,000 backstage film and TV workers will walk off set Monday. It could </span><span><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/01/historic-strike-could-soon-shut-down-hollywood?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">shutter</a></span><span> Hollywood for the first time since 1945.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>10,000+ workers represented by the United Auto Workers union across 14 John Deere production plants initiated a strike last night for the first time in 35 years.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>And on Monday, unions representing 24,000+ hospital workers in California and Oregon </span><span><a href="https://www.dailynews.com/2021/10/11/kaiser-workers-vote-to-authorize-strike-at-southern-california-hospitals-clinics/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">voted</a></span><span> to authorize a strike over insufficient pay raises and understaffing. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The picket line is growing.</strong> Nearly 1,400 <a href="https://www.npr.org/2021/10/05/1043511226/kelloggs-cereal-plants-workers-plan-to-strike?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Kellogg workers</a> started striking last week, <a href="https://buffalonews.com/business/local/too-little-too-late-union-workers-at-mercy-hospital-go-on-strike-as-talks-fail/article_934e668c-228e-11ec-bc6c-dfe65ed3281b.html?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">health care workers</a> in Buffalo, NY, have been striking since October 1, and <a href="https://www.mic.com/impact/100-years-after-the-countrys-largest-labor-war-its-dark-legacy-still-looms-84466208?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">coal miners</a> in Alabama since April. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>In all, more than <a href="https://thehill.com/business-a-lobbying/576456-more-than-100k-workers-threaten-strikes-as-unions-flex-muscles?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">100,000 unionized employees</a> have voted to authorize strikes recently, The Hill reports.—<em>MM</em></p>
</div>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
HEALTH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/13/the-fda-announces-new-guidance-to-lower-americans-salt-intake?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The FDA Tables Salt
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Salt: great for ritualistic demon repelling, bad for eating in excess. The Food and Drug Administration announced new <a href="https://www.fda.gov/regulatory-information/search-fda-guidance-documents/guidance-industry-voluntary-sodium-reduction-goals?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">recommended limits</a> Wednesday on how much salt manufacturers and restaurants should use in food, with the goal of reducing Americans’ overall sodium intake by 12% over the next 2.5 years.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px"><li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The FDA’s goal is to lower rates of heart disease, the US’ leading cause of death, along with hypertension and stroke.</span></li></ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The FDA is targeting producers because, well, switching to Lay's Lightly Salted isn't good enough. “There is very little that the average consumer can do. The only way to have a significant impact on sodium intake is by putting the onus on industry,” Dr. Peter Lurie, the president of an influential food industry watchdog group, said.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>the FDA’s new 3,000 mg/day goal is <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2021/10/13/health/fda-sodium-limits-bn-wellness/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">still more</a> than the Dietary Guidelines for Americans’s recommendation of 2,300—or just one teaspoon. But the administration plans to introduce additional targets to “incrementally” lower Americans’ sodium intake over time.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">While we’re here:</strong> Watch <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RG9TMn1FJzc" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">this video</a> of how ibexes get salt. They’re actually the GOAT.<em>—JW</em></p>
</div>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TOGETHER WITH THE MOTLEY FOOL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="#" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Close Your Eyes
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.fool.com/mms/mark/a-sa-5stocks-again?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=contentmarketing&utm_campaign=5stocksunder50-again&aid=9394&paid=9394&waid=9394&source=esamnbwdg0500015&psource=esamnbwdg0500015&wsource=esamnbwdg0500015" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="The Motley Fool" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://media2.morningbrew.com/uploads/placement/images/2175/1633112103-Calendar-6.jpg">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">And imagine yourself 20 years from now...you could be sipping a pina colada on your very own private beach. Let’s call it Pina Colada Island.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But how do you get here? To the island of no work and only pina coladas? Well, you might want to consider getting your retirement in order—starting with stock picks from <a href="https://www.fool.com/mms/mark/a-sa-5stocks-again?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=contentmarketing&utm_campaign=5stocksunder50-again&aid=9394&paid=9394&waid=9394&source=esamnbwdg0500015&psource=esamnbwdg0500015&wsource=esamnbwdg0500015" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">The Motley Fool</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In order to grow your wealth for the long-term, you gotta start now, <strong style="color:#000">and The Motley Fool has consistently led some investors to life-changing investment returns for the last 25+ years.</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Heck, they recommended Tesla right before the pandemic, and then <a href="https://www.fool.com/mms/mark/a-sa-5stocks-again?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=contentmarketing&utm_campaign=5stocksunder50-again&aid=9394&paid=9394&waid=9394&source=esamnbwdg0500015&psource=esamnbwdg0500015&wsource=esamnbwdg0500015" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Tesla grew like crazy</a>. While it’s tempting to call them wizards, their hard-working analysts would disagree.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Point is: You never know if the companies The Motley Fool is picking right now could make Pina Colada Island a reality 20 years down the road. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://www.fool.com/mms/mark/a-sa-5stocks-again?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=contentmarketing&utm_campaign=5stocksunder50-again&aid=9394&paid=9394&waid=9394&source=esamnbwdg0500015&psource=esamnbwdg0500015&wsource=esamnbwdg0500015" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Learn more about their latest stock picks today</a>. </p>

</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/13/key-performance-indicators-october-14?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">

Key Performance Indicators

<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat: </strong>In its 50th anniversary year, Starbucks accounts for <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2021-10-12/starbucks-is-50-and-emboldening-its-rivals-more-than-ever?sref=qTxNuhoP" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">about 15,000</a> of the US’ more than 37,000 coffeehouses, according to Bloomberg. 30 years ago, in 1991, the US had just 1,650 coffee houses, of which 165 were Starbucks.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote:</strong> “It’s just flat out not true.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Southwest’s incoming CEO, Bob Jordan, told The Points Guy that widespread cancellations were <a href="https://thepointsguy.com/news/southwest-airlines-new-ceo-pilots-cancellations/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">not caused by</a> a pilot “sick-out” in protest of an upcoming vaccination mandate. Southwest’s operations mostly returned to normal Tuesday.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>Meet the people pursuing the pleasure of leisure, aka the time millionaires. <tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPACE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/13/william-shatner-thinks-everyone-in-the-world-needs-to-see-space?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
William Shatner Wants You to Go to Space
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/13/william-shatner-thinks-everyone-in-the-world-needs-to-see-space?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Blue Origin Launches with William Shatner on NBC" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bl383u0v/production/20b0e80db54f07d5f674537df1a80b2e23874670-520x293.gif?w=670&q=70&auto=format">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>NBC</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">At 90 years old, actor William Shatner became the oldest person to <a href="https://www.space.com/william-shatner-blue-origin-flight-moved-tears-reaction?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">go to space</a> yesterday, proof that only Forbes cares about young people doing stuff. After his flight, the tally of private citizens who have gone cosmic this year is up to 21.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Shatner had a lot to say following his 10-minute space visit aboard Blue Origin’s New Shepard spacecraft. Here are the most wholesome quotes of the bunch:</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">“I hope I never recover from this. I hope that I can maintain what I feel now. I don't want to lose it. ...It has to do with the enormity and the quickness and the suddenness of life and death. Oh my god, it’s unbelievable."</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">“The moment you see the vulnerability of everything; it’s so small. This air, which is keeping us alive, is thinner than your skin.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">He told Jeff Bezos, “What you’ve given me is the most profound experience I can imagine.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">“Everybody in the world needs to do this. Everybody in the world needs to see.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Would love to, Mr. Shatner, but not sure we have that kind of pocket change lying around. Tickets on rival Virgin Galactic’s SpaceShipTwo go for $450,000 a pop.—<em>MM</em></p>
</div>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GAMES
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="#" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The Puzzle Section
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Brew Mini: </strong>It's Thursday already? Get one step closer to Friday by completing the mini crossword puzzle <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/10/13/brew-mini-digital-assets?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">right here</a>.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Three headlines and a lie</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Three of these news headlines are real and one is faker than the moisturizing power of Coca-Cola Lip Smackers. Can you guess the odd one out?</p>
<ol>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Consternation in New Zealand as native bat </span><span><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2021/oct/11/consternation-in-new-zealand-as-native-bat-included-in-bird-of-the-year-poll?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">included</a></span><span> in bird of the year poll</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Cats have attachment styles just like babies and dogs, new </span><span><a href="https://www.insideedition.com/cats-have-attachment-styles-just-like-babies-and-dogs-new-study-finds-70177?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=mb" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">study</a></span><span> finds</span>

\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ca style=\"text-decoration:none;border:none;\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"Aerial view of the Long Beach and Los Angeles ports\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eMario Tama/Getty Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSome US corporations are about to work Waffle House hours.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn the face of historic supply chain bottlenecks, large goods carriers Walmart, UPS, and FedEx pledged yesterday to \u003ca href=\"https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/white-house/white-house-announce-walmart-fedex-ups-will-increase-services-help-n1281387?utm_source=morning_brew\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_campaign=mb\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eramp up\u003c/a\u003e their efforts to relieve some of the clogging from ports. Meanwhile, the Port of Los Angeles, one of the busiest in the country, will join its neighbor the Port of Long Beach and go 24/7.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eTogether, LA and Long Beach move more than 25% of American imports, the \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/l-a-port-to-operate-around-the-clock-to-ease-cargo-logjams-white-house-says-11634115601?mod=hp_lead_pos7\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eWSJ reports\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eBut loads of containers are stuck there, and \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/article/coronavirus-pandemic-joe-biden-business-los-angeles-health-48ff262b882a37308e4a3f15934b2ee4?utm_source=morning_brew\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_campaign=mb\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e81 cargo ships\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e are hanging out in the Pacific Ocean waiting to dock and unload as of Monday.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eA problem so bad POTUS needed to get involved\u003c/h2\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThis overtime plan was put together by the Biden administration, which has been scrambling to solve one of the nastiest side effects of the pandemic. As a result of factory shutdowns, worker shortages, and high demand, supply chains have become more tangled than your headphone wires.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eHow you know it’s ugly: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThis year, S\u0026P 500 companies have said the words “\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-10-13/supply-chain-chatter-hits-record-highs-on-earnings-calls?srnd=premium\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esupply chain\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e” on earnings calls more than “synergy” or “value proposition” combined.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAnother reason the White House is so concerned about this issue?\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eInflategate won’t go away\u003c/h2\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe prices of goods and services, as measured by the consumer price index, rose \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-10-13/u-s-consumer-prices-grew-by-more-than-forecast-in-september?utm_source=morning_brew\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_campaign=mb\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e5.4% annually\u003c/a\u003e in September. That’s the same pace as in June and July but a little higher than August.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSnarled supply chains are considered one of the main drivers of higher prices this year. And skyrocketing prices, especially in the energy sector, could put a dent in the economic recovery. Just a few days ago, Goldman Sachs \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/world/us/goldman-cuts-forecast-us-economic-growth-2021-2022-2021-10-10/?utm_source=morning_brew\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_campaign=mb\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecut its economic growth\u003c/a\u003e forecasts for 2021 and 2022.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eIn yet another sign of rising inflation, retirees receiving Social Security benefits will get a \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/article/social-security-cola-increase-4f2cd7b763371b91923227be883e367e?utm_source=morning_brew\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_campaign=mb\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e5.9% bump\u003c/a\u003e in their payments in 2022 to adjust for the higher cost of living. That’s the biggest increase to Social Security checks in 39 years.—\u003cem\u003eNF\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" Salt\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSalt: great for ritualistic demon repelling, bad for eating in excess. The Food and Drug Administration announced new \u003ca href=\"https://www.fda.gov/regulatory-information/search-fda-guidance-documents/guidance-industry-voluntary-sodium-reduction-goals?utm_source=morning_brew\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_campaign=mb\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erecommended limits\u003c/a\u003e Wednesday on how much salt manufacturers and restaurants should use in food, with the goal of reducing Americans’ overall sodium intake by 12% over the next 2.5 years.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe FDA’s goal is to lower rates of heart disease, the US’ leading cause of death, along with hypertension and stroke.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe FDA is targeting producers because, well, switching to Lay's Lightly Salted isn't good enough. “There is very little that the average consumer can do. The only way to have a significant impact on sodium intake is by putting the onus on industry,” Dr. Peter Lurie, the president of an influential food industry watchdog group, said.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003ethe FDA’s new 3,000 mg/day goal is \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/10/13/health/fda-sodium-limits-bn-wellness/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_campaign=mb\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estill more\u003c/a\u003e than the Dietary Guidelines for Americans’s recommendation of 2,300—or just one teaspoon. But the administration plans to introduce additional targets to “incrementally” lower Americans’ sodium intake over time.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhile we’re here:\u003c/strong\u003e Watch \u003ca href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RG9TMn1FJzc\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ethis video\u003c/a\u003e of how ibexes get salt. href=\"https://www.space.com/william-shatner-blue-origin-flight-moved-tears-reaction?utm_source=morning_brew\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_campaign=mb\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ego to space\u003c/a\u003e yesterday, proof that only Forbes cares about young people doing stuff. After his flight, the tally of private citizens who have gone cosmic this year is up to 21.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eShatner had a lot to say following his 10-minute space visit aboard Blue Origin’s New Shepard spacecraft. Here are the most wholesome quotes of the bunch:\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e“I hope I never recover from this. I hope that I can maintain what I feel now. I don't want to lose it. ...It has to do with the enormity and the quickness and the suddenness of life and death. Oh my god, it’s unbelievable.\"\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e“The moment you see the vulnerability of everything; it’s so small. This air, which is keeping us alive, is thinner than your skin.”\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eHe told Jeff Bezos, “What you’ve given me is the most profound experience I can imagine.”\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e“Everybody in the world needs to do this. Everybody in the world needs to see.”\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWould love to, Mr. Shatner, but not sure we have that kind of pocket change lying around.
